subject: Chemistry
question_text: The product formed in the following reaction is : 2025 (29 Jan Shift 1) JEE Main 2025 January JEE Main Previous Year Paper MathonGo (A) (I) β −C 1 −C 4 , plant (B) (II) α −C 1 −C 4 , (C) Glycogen (III) α −C 1 −C 4 , α −C 1 −C 6 , plant (D) (IV) α −C 1 −C 4 , plant List - I (Carbohydrate) List - II (Linkage Source) E ⊖ Pb 4+ /Pb 2+ = +1.67 V E ⊖ Sn 4+ /Sn 2+ = +1.15 V E ⊖ 3+ /Al = −1.66 V E ⊖ T1 /Tl/2.26 V (P)
